italki call to action: Get a free Italian lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_ita
Demographics: 57,700,000 in Italy (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 63,655,047.
3,800,000 in Italy (2002). Population total all countries: 3,852,500.

2,230. 500 in Lusernese Cimbrian in Trentino Alto Oolige 40 km southeast from Trento, plus 1,500 Sette Comuni Cimbrian (40% of Roana (Rowan), 70% of Messaselva di Roana Rotzo) in Veneto around 60 km north of Vicenza (Kloss 1978), and 230 or 65% of Giazza (Ijetzan) Veneto, 43 km northeast of Verona (1992 R. Zamponi). 22,700 were in Sieben Gemeinde and 12,400 in Dreizehn Gemeinde in 1854.

fields.Geneaology: "[ Indo-European, Italic, Romance, Italo-Western, Italo-Dalmatian ]; [ Indo-European, Italic, Romance, Italo-Western, Western, Gallo-Iberian, Gallo-Romance, Gallo-Italian ]; [ Indo-European, Germanic, West, High German, German, Upper German, Bavarian-Austrian ]"
